entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
